24 Nov 2017 This post describes some of the motivations, theory, and implementation behind
"minimal invalidation" (also tracked in issue #317). A major part of the philosophy of performance in xi is that as much of the processing
as possible is  incremental.  Basically, this means that a change toâ€¦
